metadata.title: CVE-2022-31213 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in dbus-broker before 31. Multiple NULL pointer dereferences can be found when supplying a malformed XML config file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31213` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dbus-broker - 31-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dbus-broker package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '31-1').
